clean_data: Cyber Security Mentor Cyber span lSecurityspan Mentor Vansant VA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Cyber Security Mentor EWI Columbus OH September 2018 to March 2019 One of four residents in my county to be selected for a pilot cybersecurity training program More specific details of the pilot can be found here httpswwwvacedaorgvcedacloseson509895granttobuchanancountyidaforcybersecurityproject We were trained on various basic networking security postures frameworks incident response vulnerability management threat management risk assessment network monitoring IDSIPS and more This training Included NIST ITIL CSF PCIDSS and applications such as Snort Kibana Nessus nmap Wireshark PuTTY and more We were trained under experienced certified network and security analystspenetration testers at Build Cyber Bowling Green KY After having passed the respective CompTIA certification I led the last month of our program as a mentor to the others IT Service Center Analyst Northrop Grumman Lebanon VA October 2016 to September 2018 As help desk analysts we provided 247 technical support for Northrop employees contractors and business partners via telephone and chat This included the use of a ticket system where during busy times of the year we finish our shifts with 70 or more tickets We provided troubleshooting and support for a wide range of applications mostly related to engineering network connectivity user account information and more We were required to meet certain monthly statistical averages in regard to call handle time and ticket processing I performed well on nearly all of my customer feedback surveys Admissions Assistant Appalachian College of Pharmacy Oakwood VA August 2014 to October 2016 While working in the office for admissions and the Registrar I was tasked with maintaining student records both physical and digital copies Our office also handled both potential and newly accepted students As the only 3year PharmD program in the state of Virginia our office was very busy yearround We set up interview events graduation and orientation I personally helped develop a method of processing the PhamCAS Pharmacy College Application Service applications almost completely online making the processing more efficient and less wasteful Education Bachelors in Cyber Security and Information Assurance Western Governors University Salt Lake City UT June 2019 to Present Skills Active Directory 2 years Cisco Less than 1 year CompTIA Less than 1 year Customer Service 5 years Linux Less than 1 year Mac 2 years Microsoft Office 8 years Networking Less than 1 year Python Less than 1 year Information Security Nist Cyber Security Siem training Security CertificationsLicenses CompTIA CySA March 2019 to March 2022 Formerly known as CSA CySA is the most uptodate security analyst certification that covers advanced persistent threats in a post2014 cybersecurity environment CySA is the only intermediate highstakes cybersecurity analyst certification with performancebased questions covering security analytics intrusion detection and response Assessments Technical Support Expert April 2019 Measures a candidates ability to apply protocols to identify errors and solutions in order to maintain system function Full results
